casebody.data:
No. 10-290. Microsoft Corporation, Petitioner v. I4I Limited Partnership, et al. 562 U.S. 1060, 131 S. Ct. 647,

178 L. Ed. 2d 476,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9311. November 29, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit granted.

The Chief Justice took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 598 F.3d 831.
